thread.title: Matthew Carle named President of Koniag Information Security Services, LLC

author: cnbc.com
title: Matthew Carle named President of Koniag Information Security Services, LLC
text:
CHANTILLY, Va., Feb. 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Matthew Carle, a 20-year veteran of Federal IT and management consulting services, has been named as President of Koniag Information Security Services, LLC (KSS). In this role, Mr. Carle sets the strategic direction of the Company and ensures that KSS continues to deliver impactful solutions to its customers. His leadership will enhance all aspects of KSS' delivery of solutions and services to enable client success, as well as KSS revenue, profitability, and growth.
Prior to this appointment, Mr. Carle served as KSS' Vice President of Enterprise Planning and Analytics. In this role, he provided innovative solutions to challenging business problems within the Department of Defense and other federal agencies. Over his five years with the Koniag family of companies, he has spearheaded nearly $200 million in new contract awards, successfully built and managed large and highly proficient capability teams, and worked across a broad and diverse client portfolio.
Koniag Government Service's CEO, Ed O'Hare, commented: "The addition of Matt strengthens our team's ability to deliver valued results within mission-critical technology programs across the DoD and in agencies focused on national security. His leadership will ensure the future success of KSS and will contribute to the continued success of all Koniag Government Services Sector companies."
About Koniag Government Services
Koniag Government Services (KGS) provides shared services and resources to the 9 operating companies that comprise the government services sector, including Koniag Information Security Services, LLC. KGS companies have supported Federal, State, and Local clients, in dozens of locations worldwide for over 20 years. KGS has an impeccable reputation for superb performance and maintaining long term partnerships with our clients.
For more information, please visit www.koniaggss.com .
